data.title: Bondi Sands
data.text:
The Australian Open is a fundamental part of the Australian summer, and we are excited to be supplying our much:[object Object];" new="">Game. Set. Protect. with Bondi Sands Sport SPF 50 Wet Skin Sunscreen. This lightweight Sunscreen Lotion for face and body is fast absorbing, non-greasy and can be applied to wet skin for the highest SPF protection. Featuring Cool MotionTM Technology that offers high performance protection whilst allowing your skin to sweat, our Wet Skin Sunscreen will naturally keep you cool and composed whilst you watch the best out on the court.

Across the 15 days of top tennis, we will give away over 500,000 FREE Bondi Sands Sport SPF 50 Wet Skin sunscreen samples from our three Game. Set. Protect. Sunscreen Stations, positioned around the Melbourne Park precinct. In addition to our Sunscreen Stations, we will also have the Bondi Sands Misting Station located at Grand Slam Oval, and another Bondi Sands Arch Mister over by Show Court 3 and the Western Courts.

This season, Bondi Sands is increasing its offering of misters with over 50 additional placements, as well as extending sun protection to fans passing through the Australian Open gates, with the overarching objective of reinforcing sun protection. There is a sunscreen station at each entrance under an umbrella along with the daily UV index on entrance sign to communicate sun safety messaging. Come by, grab some sunscreen, cool down and refresh at the Bondi Sands Misting Stations, the place to be this Summer!

Check out the AO 2024 event map for all our sunscreen station & mister activation locations click here

Also, donâ€™t forget to keep your eye out for our Game. Set. Protect. Bondi Sands team roaming the site, ensuring that no fan remains unprotected whilst enjoying a day at the AO.

See our full range of sun care products at bondisands.com.au/collections/sun-care

Connect with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/BondiSands/

Follow us on Instagram, Twitter and TikTok @bondisands

Enjoy the 2024 Australian Open and Game. Set. Protect. with Bondi Sands.
